alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Hole Mountains; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 4:59PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Thunderstorm outflow boundary will impact portions of southwestern Fremont, Jefferson, northeastern Butte, north central Bonneville, Madison and southwestern Clark Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 459 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm outflow boundary along a line extending from 10 miles northeast of Arco to Terreton to near Iona. Movement was northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rexburg, Rigby, Dubois, Terreton, Lorenzo, Ririe Reservoir, Sugar City, Ucon, Menan, Teton, Ririe, Roberts, Lewisville, Mud Lake, Parker, Hamer, Archer, Egin, St Anthony and Monteview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Big Hole Mountains; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain
